thread.title: Ground News - Wall Street Journal: Biden puts US troops in danger
thread.title_full: Ground News - Wall Street Journal: Biden puts US troops in danger

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Wall Street Journal: Biden puts US troops in danger
text:
Summary by Ground News Iranian proxies have attacked U.S. forces in the Middle East about 100 times since October. David Rothkopf: When will President Joe Biden do his duty as commander in chief and protect Americans deployed abroad? He says Biden is afraid of being involved in a larger conflict, which might not be popular in an election year. Rothkapf: The biggest tonic for disorder in the Mideast would be restoring American deterrence. Share menu More
